law.history: Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 308, sec. 1. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. IV, secs. 20(4) and 20(6). -- Amended 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 179, sec. 2. -- Amended 1958 Ky. Acts ch. 153, sec. 1. -- Amended 1946 Ky. Acts ch. 48, sec. 1. -- Amended 1945 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 3, sec. 1. -- Amended 1944 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1; and .ch. 147, sec. 1. -- Amended 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 10, sec. 1. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat., 165-48.
